CricBangla is a user-friendly easy-to-use app to fully live the World Cup 2019. All aboard to the CricBangla ship, an amazing app with all your future world-cup questions and queries. Our user friendly app will have the following features that are easy to navigate.
Features: 

1. Live Scores of Cricket Matches by clicking the Live Bangla Commentary. 

2. Live Match Commentary in Bangla by Experts 

3. Summary and description including batting, bowling and fielding of all World Cup 2019 Matches by clicking Match Info 

4. Fixtures of ICC World Cup 2019 England and Wales 

5. ICC Cricket Teams World Cup Squad of Australia, Bangladesh, England, New Zealand, Pakistan, India, Sri Lanka, West Indies, South Africa, Afghanistan in the Squad button.
